revision.text:
'''Rare held items''' can be dropped by wild Pokémon on [[Route Statistics|routes]] or in [[Dungeons|dungeons]]. The chance for Underground-type items to be dropped is 1 / 2048, while the chance for other item types is 1 / 512. This chance is increased by 50% when the [[Item Magnet]] is in effect.
=Pokémon with held items=
All of these items can be found in other ways.
Item-type: [[Evolution Items|evolution items]] that can be bought in [[Shops|shops]] or mined in the [[Underground]] (some of them).
Underground-type: items found in the Underground that are not evolution items.
Berry-type: [[Berries|berries]] that can be grown and harvested in the [[Farm]].
